column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''46''' is the forty-sixth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Addenda and Corrigenda to [[the Etymologies]]" — Part Two — [[Carl F. Hostetter]] and [[Patrick H. Wynne]] with an appendix on the tengwar of the Etymologies by [[Arden R. Smith]]
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
*[http://www.tolkienindex.net/index/Category:Vinyar_Tengwar_46_Index Online index of names for ''Vinyar Tengar'' 46]
